titles.title: Family Health Care Flexibility Act
A bill to amend the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act to repeal certain limitations on health care benefits.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 3/19/2013--Introduced. Family Health Care Flexibility Act - Repeals provisions of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act and the Health Care and Education Reconciliation Act of 2010 that: (1) restrict payments from health savings accounts, medical savings accounts, and health flexible spending arrangements for medications to prescription drugs and insulin only (thus allowing payments for over-the-counter medications); and (2) impose a $2,500 limitation on salary reduction contributions to a health flexible spending arrangement under a cafeteria plan.
